subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Philippe Gilbert of Belgium, who has won 23 races this year, passed Cadel Evans, the winner of this year’s Tour de France, as the leader of the World Tour points ranking with a victory in the Grand Prix of Quebec.
snippet: Philippe Gilbert of Belgium, who has won 23 races this year, passed Cadel Evans, the winner of this year’s Tour de France, as the leader of the World Tour points ranking with a victory in the Grand Prix of Quebec.
